title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions Related to JNK Stock

content.text: JNK, the SPDR Barclays High Yield Bond ETF, is launched on November 28, 2007.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2009.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2010.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2011.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2012.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2013.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2014.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2015.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2016.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2017.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2018.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2019.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2020.
No stock splits or corporate actions related to JNK were recorded in 2021.
